Question.Subject: Firefox won't fill in my usernames and associated passwords?
Question.Content: My Firefox used to remember my usernames and passwords, I had to reformat HD and reinstall and now it will remember passwords, but only if I type in the username. Before if I went to a login page that I had a saved password for, the usermane and passwords would already be typed in. Any idea how to get it to do that again? I have security options set to remember passwords.
Question.ChosenAnswer: I have the same issue with mine. Mine started doing it when I upgraded from version 2.0 to 3.6 yesterday. I hope someone has a fix for it because I use it to keep numerous passwords.

Answer.Content: I have the same issue with mine. Mine started doing it when I upgraded from version 2.0 to 3.6 yesterday. I hope someone has a fix for it because I use it to keep numerous passwords.
